about_the_game:
A. New Character - Magician
As a descendant of the Hope family Little Red Riding Hood discovered a strange bond between her body and cards when she was very young. She sought to cover up this supernatural phenomenon and magic became her best excuse.

B. New Monsters(10+)
Gravedigger, Frog King, Church Doctor, Nightcrow, Christmas Dwarf, Merfolk, Bear Mage, Forrest Lawman, Mushroom Elder, Treasure Hunter, Mystery Men...

C. New Cards(100+)
We have developed a plenty of new cards for the Magician, other classes and the monsters. Experience much more strategy than before in the new DLC!

D. New Events
Temporary Blessing, Wandering Spectre, Greedy Chest, Modest Chest
